required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effectiveness and Adherence of Golimumab in Rheumatoid Arthritis
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective Multicenter Registry of Golimumab in Chinese Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis

brief_summary.textblock: This will be a prospective, observational, single-arm, registry study based on data received from Chinese Registry of rheumatoid arthritis (CREDIT) database to register 200 Chinese RA patients treated with golimumab in one year. Patient characteristic, clinical effectiveness and drug adherence of golimumab will be evaluated.

detailed_description.textblock: This multicenter (12 centers), prospective program will register 200 RA patients routinely receiving golimumab treatment. Doctor will record the disease evaluation, concomitant drug, adverse events and laboratory tests based on patient's visit till they withdraw from clinical visit. Doctor will still collect above information whether patient interrupt or stop golimumab till the end of program or patient withdraw permanently.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of low disease activity (CDAI) at week 12
primary_outcome.description: Low disease activity is defined as crohn's disease activity index (CDAI)≤ 10.
Remission is defined as crohn's disease activity index (CDAI)≤ 2.8.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of low disease activity (DAS28-CRP) at week 12
secondary_outcome.description: Low disease activity is defined as DAS28-CRP score ≥ 2.6 but ≤ 3.2

secondary_outcome.measure: Patient disease activity assessment (VAS) at week 12
secondary_outcome.description: based on a scale of 0=no disease to 10=severe disease

secondary_outcome.measure: Patient Pain Global assessment (VAS) at week 12
secondary_outcome.description: based on a scale of 0=no disease to 10=severe disease
Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index (HAQ-DI) for function evaluation

arm_group.description: Patients (or a representative) must provide informed consent before any procedures occur. Main Inclusion Criteria: 18 years and older Fulfil the ACR/EULAR classification criteria for RA in 2010 Patients able to understand and complete self-evaluation questionnaires. General Exclusion Criteria: Contraindications for golimumab Prior exposure to TNFi/JAKi

intervention.description: This multicenter (12 centers), prospective program will register 200 RA patients routinely receiving golimumab treatment. Doctor will record the disease evaluation, concomitant drug, adverse events and laboratory tests based on patient's visit till they withdraw from clinical visit. Doctor will still collect above information whether patient interrupt or stop golimumab till the end of program or patient withdraw permanently.

study_pop.textblock: This multicenter (12 centers), prospective program will register 200 RA patients routinely receiving golimumab treatment. Doctor will record the disease evaluation, concomitant drug, adverse events and laboratory tests based on patient's visit till they withdraw from clinical visit.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- - 18 years and older
- Fulfil the ACR/EULAR classification criteria for RA in 2010
- Patients able to understand and complete self-evaluation questionnaires.
Exclusion Criteria:
- - Contraindications for golimumab
- Prior exposure to TNFi/JAKi
